forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 7C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 46F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 3C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
